channel.title: Correct Npc's for Training on Real Rs2
channel.description: [u][b][i]For levels 3-12: [/i] [/b] [/u] Train on Chickens, Cows, Man, Woman, Farmers (6+), Spiders, Goblins, The Lumbridge Gaurd by Goblins. [b][i][u]For levels 13-25:[/u][/i][/b] Train on Alkaraid Gaurds, Gaurds, Chaos Druids(if mem), Ham (if mem), Duel Arena, Everything Above too, Pvp Worlds, Wildy, Bats, Red Spiders, Dwarfs, Wolfs. [b][i][u]For Levels 30-50[/u][/i][/b] Train On PVP Worlds, Bounty Hunter, Clan Wars, All of Above, Black Spider, Gaurd Dwarfs, Wolfs, King Bats, Adrougne Gaurd, Hero, Paliden Knight, Slayer NPC's as Hand, and other NPC's at Slayer Tower. [b][i][u]For Levels 70-100[/u][/i][/b] Dragons, GWD, Hero, King Wolf, Mage Arena NPC's, Black King Bats, Druids, Warrior Guild W\E Armour Monsters Including; Rune, Adamant, Mithril, Black, Steel, Iron, Bronze, KDB, Wildy, PVP Worlds, Duel Arena, Castle Wars(For Fun Not Much Xp tbh), Black Dragon, Green Dragon, Blue Dragon, Red Dragon. [b][i][u]For Levels 110-138[/u][/i][/b]Everything Above, KDB, GWD, Black Dragon, Red Dragon, Blue Dragon, Green Dragon (good money!). Please Rep!

item.title: Correct Npc's for Training on Real Rs2
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:21, topic:383001”]Those are horrible recommendations…

For levels 13-25: Train on Alkaraid Gaurds, Gaurds, Chaos Druids(if mem), Ham (if mem), Duel Arena, Everything Above too, Pvp Worlds, Wildy, Bats, Red Spiders, Dwarfs, Wolfs.

You’d get raped at level 13.[/quote]
Also put in mind some people go for pures… My pure got raped at level 30 >.>

Read full topic
item.source: Correct Npc's for Training on Real Rs2

For levels 13-25: Train on Alkaraid Gaurds, Gaurds, Chaos Druids(if mem), Ham (if mem), Duel Arena, Everything Above too, Pvp Worlds, Wildy, Bats, Red Spiders, Dwarfs, Wolfs.
For Levels 30-50 Train On PVP Worlds, Bounty Hunter, Clan Wars, All of Above, Black Spider, Gaurd Dwarfs, Wolfs, King Bats, Adrougne Gaurd, Hero, Paliden Knight, Slayer NPC’s as Hand, and other NPC’s at Slayer Tower.
For Levels 70-100 Dragons, GWD, Hero, King Wolf, Mage Arena NPC’s, Black King Bats, Druids, Warrior Guild W\E Armour Monsters Including; Rune, Adamant, Mithril, Black, Steel, Iron, Bronze, KDB, Wildy, PVP Worlds, Duel Arena, Castle Wars(For Fun Not Much Xp tbh), Black Dragon, Green Dragon, Blue Dragon, Red Dragon.
For Levels 110-138Everything Above, KDB, GWD, Black Dragon, Red Dragon, Blue Dragon, Green Dragon (good money!). Please Rep![/quote]

item.title: Correct Npc's for Training on Real Rs2
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=achmed555 link=topic=478784.msg3504969#msg3504969 date=1298078874]
For levels 3-12: Train on Chickens, Cows, Man, Woman, Farmers (6+), Spiders, Goblins, The Lumbridge Gaurd by Goblins.
For levels 13-25: Train on Alkaraid Gaurds, Gaurds, Chaos Druids(if mem), Ham (if mem), Duel Arena, Everything Above too, Pvp Worlds, Wildy, Bats, Red Spiders, Dwarfs, Wolfs.
For Levels 30-50 Train On PVP Worlds, Bounty Hunter, Clan Wars, All of Above, Black Spider, Gaurd Dwarfs, Wolfs, King Bats, Adrougne Gaurd, Hero, Paliden Knight, Slayer NPC’s as Hand, and other NPC’s at Slayer Tower.
For Levels 70-100 Dragons, GWD, Hero, King Wolf, Mage Arena NPC’s, Black King Bats, Druids, Warrior Guild W\E Armour Monsters Including; Rune, Adamant, Mithril, Black, Steel, Iron, Bronze, KDB, Wildy, PVP Worlds, Duel Arena, Castle Wars(For Fun Not Much Xp tbh), Black Dragon, Green Dragon, Blue Dragon, Red Dragon.
For Levels 110-138Everything Above, KDB, GWD, Black Dragon, Red Dragon, Blue Dragon, Green Dragon (good money!). Please Rep!
[/quote]Does this mean if you’re level 26-29, 51-69, or 101-109 you have nowhere to train? :([/quote]

Where am I supposed to train if my combat level is 12.5?

Read full topic

For Levels 110-138Everything Above, KDB, GWD, Black Dragon, Red Dragon, Blue Dragon, Green Dragon (good money!). Please Rep!

For Levels 30-50 Train On PVP Worlds, Bounty Hunter, Clan Wars, All of Above, Black Spider, Gaurd Dwarfs, Wolfs, King Bats, Adrougne Gaurd, Hero, Paliden Knight, Slayer NPC’s as Hand, and other NPC’s at Slayer Tower.
For Levels 70-100 Dragons, GWD, Hero, King Wolf, Mage Arena NPC’s, Black King Bats, Druids, Warrior Guild W\E Armour Monsters Including; Rune, Adamant, Mithril, Black, Steel, Iron, Bronze, KDB, Wildy, PVP Worlds, Duel Arena, Castle Wars(For Fun Not Much Xp tbh), Black Dragon, Green Dragon, Blue Dragon, Red Dragon.
